resources.string: I\'m a highly prospective Android Developer on the mobile track[Kotlin]. \nI am an organised and team-oriented developer, who can work in a fast paced environment. I always welcome challenging environments and situations that give me the opportunity to develop new skills. I also write a bit of Vue.js.
What I Offer To Your Company

I\'ve been designing and building mobile Android applications for the past two years from which I\'ve gained knowledge that I can use to build industry standard applications in your organisation. \nI am an organised and team-oriented developer, which helped in getting tasks done faster in previous organisations I\'ve worked with. I\'ve been able to work well under pressure and juggle more than one task at a time which I feel will come in handy when tasks are needed to be sped up
